title: @Meddler 1 more champion In 2016?
body: In one of the posts Riot Meddler said that we should expect the same amount of champions that we got In 2015, last year there was {{champion:432}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:420}} In 2016 so far we received {{champion:202}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:163}} and Kled, so that leaves us with 1 more champ to go. I know we're getting a lot of great content later this year like assasins rework or yorick rework, but champions are the most exiting for me and they are keeping this game fresh. Will be there more champions this year?

replies.body: It's almost guaranteed that Kled won't be the last new champ to come out in 2016.
Aside from Yorick right?
Yes, since Meddler is probably referring to _completely new_ Champions and not to Champion Updates (no matter their size).
thank god. im not loving Kled and would be kinda upset if he was the last
Srly tho, don't know why people downvote.This dude just stated his opinion , what's so wrong about someone disliking a champ you like.
idk. probably the people who are hyped for him are the downvoters. Nothing wrong with that really, while Kled isnt my kinda of champ, he might be the kind of champion a top laner was waiting for.
Because for some reason people perceive "_having opinions_" as "_stating the truth_", so they are downvoting, as if the guy was lying.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EciQUrtb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-30T00:14:25.675+0000)
>
> It's almost guaranteed that Kled won't be the last new champ to come out in 2016.

Can you be really hard on the jhin nerfs please q_q. i beg you
Jhin doesn't need hard nerfs. Stop crying.

His last shoot of ult needs to deal less damage because it's too forgiving for jhin if he misses all other shoots. And that's it. Jhin has no other problems honestly (other prob is mainly cause Youmuu).

the main problem i have with jhin is the refund cd on not used shot if you ulted poorly suck it up and deal with it almost no other champions get their ult refund if they go "o on second thought i dont want" and the few ones that do like panth shouldnt either. the other thing is i think the slow should be reduce since if you hit 1 shot its almost 100% chance of hitting the next shot unless some one body blocks for them or they have a dash/flash
only if Kayle can have her 5 AD back : ^)
Please make it a support.... its been a while since Bard...
{{champion:223}} ?
Not a real support. It was only used as support briefly and its main role is top.

New Piltover/Zaun Steampunk champion. plzplzplzplzplz

Last actual steampunk-ey champion was Jinx back in 2013.
{{champion:245}} you play league of legends right?

He's the least Steampunk Zaun/Piltover champion to date.

Ho occupies a weird aesthetic niche.

If i had to guess to avoid a massive update,we can expect the champion will be released before or after the assassin rework
Reksai was also 2015 i think
Rek'sai was actually released on 12/11/2014 as part of the 12/10/2014 patch.
I am still wondering why does the US have to use that damn date format xD
Because that's how our calendars are written? XD Plus you're on the NA board so that's what you get there :P

Well, they should go all the way and put the year on front, like so 2014-12-10, and this way, the lexicographic order is the same as the chronological order. But yeah, every time I read month first i'm lost for a few seconds.
The reason it is the way it is is because it ended up being in the same order as one verbally saying the date, with the month first

Wasn't {{champion:429}} created last year?
End of the year before
Oh ok I thought she was last year for some reason. Now I know. Thanks!
I'm hoping for a new support champion in the likes of thresh or bard.

click red tracker-see meddler-paste my thread url

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/TnAxh88H-please-look-at-this-nunu-rework-idea

There will definitely be another champion this year. 
They usually release them every 2 months or so.
We need a AD Assassin. The last champion that functioned like a assassin was Zed. Ekko is more like a hit-and-run fighter.

Noooooo. No more assassins please. We have enough with the ones right now, all of them are broken if played correctly. Plus, assassins are getting reworked. What we need is another SUPPORT for those who main the role! (-;
why do they keep adding new broken champions?
